headline: IFF Pharma Solutions to Showcase Portfolio at Excipient World 2025
summary: NEW YORK, April 28, 2025--IFF (NYSE: IFF) Pharma Solutions, a global leader in polymer innovations, will showcase its sustainable solutions at Excipient World 2025. The team will feature sustainable innovations, controlled-release formulations, and nitrosamine risk mitigation solutions at booth 205 from May 13-14, Gaylord National Resort and Convention Center, National Harbor, Maryland, USA.

headline: IFF Expands Pet Portfolio with Latest Science-driven Solutions
summary: NEW YORK, April 28, 2025--IFF (NYSE: IFF), a global powerhouse in bioscience and innovation, today announced a groundbreaking expansion of its pet portfolio. This launch marks a significant leap in IFF’s mission to revolutionize companion animal care through advanced biotechnology and innovation.
